item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, April 5, 2025 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:

14. The DDA Algorithm, explained interactively (15 points | 1 comment)

22. The Soul of an Old Machine (27 points | 2 comments)

24. How Airbnb measures listing lifetime value (65 points | 79 comments)
25. Scaling Up Reinforcement Learning for Traffic Smoothing (36 points | 18 comments)
26. New antibiotic that kills drug-resistant bacteria found in technician's garden (385 points | 266 comments)

28. Study finds solo music listening boosts social well-being (262 points | 103 comments)
29. The Fifth Kind of Optimisation (23 points | 19 comments)
